Why was Steven a dog lover?
output: he is very fond of dogs.

Instances.input:
Richie didn't have his morning coffee. He felt grumpy at work. He screamed at his boss for no apparent reason. Richie felt terrible after he had his coffee. He went to apologize to his boss.
Why did He scream at his boss?
output: he didn't have his morning coffee.
